DPRK Delegation Leaves for Malaysia
   Pyongyang, August 9 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government scientific and technological delegation led by Paek Chon Ho, vice-president of the State Academy of Sciences, left here today to participate in the second meeting of the DPRK-Malaysia  intergovernmental joint committee for scientific and technological cooperation to be held in Malaysia.
